text:
(1)

3571 Richmond Terrace, north side, at the head of Linfield Avenue, showing a colonial house with a Dutch oven. The real estate atlases from 1874 to 1907 show it to have belonged to the DeHart family.

April 2, 1922

By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr

(2)

The same, at a later date.

P. L. Sperr

(3)

An additional view, at a still later date.

P. L. Sperr

title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Linfield Avenue

text:
3571 Richmond Terrace, north side, at the head of Linfield Avenue, showing a colonial dwelling with a Dutch oven. It was owned by the De Hart family (1874-1907 atlases).

P. L. Sperr
September 25, 1931
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Linfield Avenue
